name: SteamTrain
0:
”Alexa open Steam Train”
”Alexa ask Steam Train to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: steam train
des:
Embark on a nostalgic journey with Steam Train. Feel the rhythmic chug of an old locomotive as it winds through scenic landscapes, from bustling city outskirts to serene countryside. Perfect for relaxation or as a unique background during your workday, this skill brings the golden era of rail travel right into your living room.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Steam Train
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
